translations: v.整羽；自满（preen 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: Will you stop preening yourself in front of the mirror?
sentences.translation: 你别对着镜子打扮个没完行不行？

sentences.sentence: She stood preening in their midst, delighted with the attention.
sentences.translation: 她得意洋洋地站在他们中间，为受人瞩目而高兴。

sentences.sentence: 50% of men under 35 spend at least 20 minutes preening themselves every morning in the bathroom.
sentences.translation: 50%的35岁以下男性每天早上至少花20分钟在盥洗室精心打扮。
